transcript:
Executive: Ashish
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji hanji
Customer: Ha sir good morning.
Executive: Good morning good morning.
Customer: Ha Manish bol raha tha sir aapka account main renew head office se.
Executive: Ji bhai.
Customer: Ha sir aapne 11 baje ka time liya tha na dual week ke liye.
Customer: Thoda sa postpone kar lo isko 1 baje ke liye chalte hai.
Customer: 1 baje
Executive: Ji
Executive: Theek hai to main 1 baje link share karunga whatsapp pe aapke theek hai.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Postpone the 11 AM meeting to 1 PM for dual week.



Resolution:

- Agreed to postpone the meeting to 1 PM and share the link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

meeting, postpone, dual week, whatsapp link
